title: IU Student Outreach Clinic Website
description: I worked with a group of two other classmates to complete this website for our client, the IU Student Outreach Clinic. Using IU's WCMS (an off-shoot of the Cascade Content Management System), I developed and created content for several of the site's pages.

title: Easy Cards
description: Created as a final project for NEWM-N423 in the Fall of 2022, Easy Cards is a fully featured Quizlet-like Study Tools application. I created the project with Firebase Authentication, Firestore db, and an OOP JavaScript MVC Architecture. Check out the GitHub Repo here.

title: Water St. CD & Vinyl
description: Created as a final project for NEWM-N413 in the Spring of 2022, Water St. CD & Vinyl is a complete simulation of an e-commerce website. This site was built using the CodeIgniter PHP framework, MySql, and Javascript. Users can browse shop content, filter and sort the content, login/register an account, and view past orders if they have made any. Check out the GitHub Repo here.

title: Simple Weather App
description: As the title suggests, this is a simple weather website which allows the user to view the weather of any location as well as the forecast 3 days in advance. Check out the GitHub Repo here.

title: Go - ReactJS Micro Framework
description: This is a web server written in Go that is built to serve a single-page application like React. The Go server, built in an MVC architecture, includes the ability to connect to a MySQL database. After the SPA in delivered to the client, the server will then serve as a RESTful API for the client side application. Check out the GitHub Repo here.
